name: BBarf: Herding Cats - The Scratchening
description:
Group - i dunno 

Use the Fullscreen Option for a better experience!

Made for UTS Introduction to Games Design 2022. Themes: Espionage and Unreliable

[PREMISE]

You are working as an undercover operator in the dreaded BBARF Farmasuiticals, an abhorrent group of dogs that treat their cat compatriots like a commodity to be bought and sold, to be treated like... pets. Your job is to use the laser pointer attached to every camera and lead your cat brethren to safety!

Be careful, the evil dogs have placed all sorts of awful contraptions to distract and occupy the cats, preventing them from organising and demanding better treatment and living conditions. Awful things like an endless supply of cat food, clingy and climbable walls, teleporting cardboard boxes and Gulp… Cucumbers.

You must save these beautiful creatures from such an awful existence!

[Gameplay]

Move your mouse to control the laser pointer. 

Q & E to toggle between cameras

Press F to disable the laser

R to restart Level

M to Meow  return to Main meonu T-T
